EmailTemplate.subject: Pernod Ricard Chatter® – External Access – Account about to expire
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
The Pernod Ricard Chatter account for {!External_User_Request__c.EXT_USR_RQT_First_Name__c} {!External_User_Request__c.EXT_USR_RQT_Last_Name__c} - {!External_User_Request__c.EXT_USR_RQT_Company__c} is about to expire (expiry date : {!External_User_Request__c.EXT_USE_RQT_Expiry_Date__c}).
To renew the expiry date for this user please logon to the External User Portal : https://pernod-ricard.my.salesforce.com/apex/EXT_USR_RQT_ManageExtUsers?sfdc.tabName=01rM00000000Naj
Best regards, Pernod Ricard Chatter® Team
